Text: Ha funny, I actually want to buy a physical copy of this and cannot find a place that sells one.  Like I would actually pay for a lossy copy - not!(ie amazon.com's sole offering) - whoever is making these decisions for Nadia is screwing up bigtime IMO.
haha i want a physical copy too, and yea as far as her marketing team goes, they're worthless. i figure putting her album out there for people to listen like this is actually kindof a favor. haha.
